# EXISTING STRUCTURES
### Copper plate mine at position(x=41.0, y=-82.0)
Consists of following entities:
- Burner mining drill (position x=41.0, y=-82.0) and a stone furnace at position (x=41.0, y=-80.0)
- Burner inserter (position x=39.5, y=-79.5) 
- Burner inserter (position x=41.5, y=-78.5)

### Stone furnace at position(x=60.0, y=-60.0)
Consists of a stone furnace at position (x=60.0, y=-60.0)

### Offshore pump at position(x=106.5, y=-32.5)
Consists of an offshore pump at position (x=106.5, y=-32.5)

### Boiler at position(x=111.5, y=-32.0)
Consists of a boiler at position (x=111.5, y=-32.0)

### Steam engine at position(x=117.5, y=-30.5)
Consists of a steam engine at position (x=117.5, y=-30.5)

### Pipe group at position(x=107.5, y=-34.5)
Consists of a pipe group at position (x=107.5, y=-34.5)

### Pipe group at position(x=105.5, y=-32.5)
Consists of a pipe group at position (x=105.5, y=-32.5)

### Electricity group at position(x=114.5, y=-28.666666666666668)
Consists of an electricity group at position (x=114.5, y=-28.666666666666668)

### Belt group at position(x=40.5, y=-83.5)
Consists of a belt group at position (x=40.5, y=-83.5)

### Transport belt at position(x=63.5, y=-53.5)
Consists of a transport belt at position (x=63.5, y=-53.5)

### Transport belt at position(x=64.5, y=-53.5)
Consists of a transport belt at position (x=64.5, y=-53.5)

# ERROR TIPS
### Errors when entities are not fueled
- Ensure that burner mining drills, stone furnaces, and burner inserters have fuel before use.
- Make sure boilers have fuel to operate steam engines.

### Errors when entities are not connected
- Ensure that steam engines are connected to the electricity network.
- Connect pipe groups to boilers and steam engines to facilitate fluid transfer.

### Errors when entities have no ingredients
- Ensure that stone furnaces have the necessary ingredients for smelting.
- Provide source items for burner inserters to operate.

### Errors when entities are not plugged into the electric network
- Connect electricity groups to the electric network to facilitate power transfer.

### Errors when belt groups are empty
- Ensure that belt groups have items to transport.

# NAMESPACE
No utility functions have been defined or invoked. 
No variables have been assigned.
